Subscribe to Threads / Subscription View?

2
0zymandius
Thursday, August 10th, 2017, 8:11:56 AM

So, I may be missing something (I generally am, and more than one thing at that). But I'd like some sort of functionality where I can subscribe to a particular thread (or series of threads), and have an option to view just those threads.

Right now I can either view the full folder structure, Unread Posts, Recent Posts, Recent Tags, 'Hot' posts (which are wildly misleading), and that's all. I want some sort of 'default' page that just shows my subscribed (or watched) topics / folders / whatever. Since we're at the 'messing around with the interface' stage, I thought I'd bring it up.

And if there's a way to already do this, and I'm just missing it, fantastic, and could someone explain it to me? :)

ondreian
Thursday, August 10th, 2017, 9:20:20 AM

you can change your home page to /user/<username>/watched under settings for this functionality.

by default you are subscribed to any topic you participate in.
